## Import students' progress


```{r sheet-index, echo=TRUE}
students_sheet <- data.frame(
  id = paste0("0",1:8),
  name = c("楊依晶","温之儀","石鑫峯","陳穎暐","黃鈺文","黃雨昕","黄杨雯","賴思妤"),
  sheet = list.files(pattern = ".xls$")
)

date_table <- data.frame(
  name = NULL,
  date = NULL
)

for(i in 1:dim(students_sheet)[1]){

  tmp <- cbind(name = students_sheet[i,"name"],readxl::read_xls(students_sheet[i,"sheet"],sheet = 2) %>%
    rename(unit = "單元") %>%
    rename(date = "作業驗收日") %>%
    filter(unit == "介紹我的目標效果量"))

  date_table <- rbind(date_table, tmp[,c(1,3)])  
}

#Encoding(date_table$name) <- "UTF-8"
knitr::kable(date_table)
```
